entry.title: Proposed BIP for OP_CAT
entry.summary: The email discusses the use of the OP_SUCCESS126 opcode, specifically the original opcode 0x7e. The sender agrees that there is no reason not to use OP_SUCCESS126 and highlights that in certain codebases, such as Core, there may be two OP_CAT constants which can lead to confusion. The email is dated October 22, 2023 at 09:58 and is from vjudeu via bitcoin dev.
